overview: Melik Tutuncu, Chicago-based architect of Turkish origin, talks about his grand-mother, Safiye Behar, a Jewish marxist feminist who had a 30 year-long affair with Mustapha Kemal Atat√ºrk and influenced many of the reforms he was implementing in the 1920's, which founded modern Turkey.
title: 20 minutes with Melik Tutuncu
